name: EPINASTINE HYDROCHLORIDE
side-effects:
Side-effects burning; less commonly taste
disturbance, headache, conjunctival hyperaemia, dry eye, eye pruritus,
visual disturbance, increased lacrimation, eye pain, nasal irritation,
rhinitis
doses:
adult and adolescent over 12 years, apply twice daily; max.
duration of treatment 8 weeks
